main.docTitle: Air Pollution Control (Specified Processes) (Removal of Exemption) Order 1996

subsection.leadIn: The Secretary for Planning, Environment and Lands declares that after the date specified in subsection (2), an exemption from the requirement to comply with section 13 of the Ordinance granted on or before the specified date under section 20 of the Ordinance to the owner of any of the following classes of premises no longer applies—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: premises used for the conduct of Organic Chemical Works; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: premises used for the conduct of Rendering Works.

subsection.content: The date specified for the purpose of subsection (1) is the date immediately before the first anniversary of the publication of this Order in the Gazette*.

editorialNote.content: * This Order was published in the Gazette on 18 October 1996.
